job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the core responsibilities of a Data Engineer, which involves managing and preparing data for use, aligning with the definition of data engineering and management.
This refers to the practical application of technical knowledge to build and deploy solutions, a fundamental aspect of software development.
This task involves the design and oversight of the data infrastructure, which is a key component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up the CI/CD pipeline in a secure way considering privacy constraints
job_tasks.justification: Setting up CI/CD pipelines is a core MLOps/DevOps task, essential for the deployment and maintenance of AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying solid software engineering way of working in the projects
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the application of software engineering principles to project work.

job_tasks.phrase: Setup monitoring for generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring AI models in production is a key MLOps/LLMOps responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: utilizing generative AI for customer care
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the application and use of generative AI models to solve business problems, falling under model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating an internal chatbot for agents to better answer customer questions
job_tasks.justification: Developing a chatbot, especially one for answering questions, directly involves prompt engineering and interaction with generative AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Improving solutions to summarize and label why customers contact us
job_tasks.justification: Summarizing and labeling customer contact reasons implies the development or refinement of models for text analysis and classification.

job_tasks.phrase: Making updates to our website (FAQ) and chatbot to use more interactive capabilities of GenAI
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing website and chatbot functionality with interactive GenAI capabilities points to prompt engineering and leveraging generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: tackling setting up solid monitoring of generative AI solutions and scaling to responds to many agents and customers
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the operational aspects of AI solutions, specifically monitoring and scaling, which falls under MLOps/LLMOps.

soft_skills.phrase: Eagerness for growth and embracing challenges.
We value 'Culture Add' over 'Culture Fit'. We are not recruiting clones. We're interested in what unique qualities you bring to our team, data universe and culture.
The excitement lies in tackling setting up solid monitoring of generative AI solutions and scaling to responds to many agents and customers.
At Odido we learn every day. All of us. You are responsible for your own development. That is why you decide how, what and when you learn.

profile.rationale: The role requires a strong foundation in Data Engineering (Macro-Category A, e.g., data collection, structuring, managing data architecture, implementing technical solutions, CI/CD, API's, monitoring) and specific tasks related to Generative AI (Macro-Category B, e.g., utilizing generative AI, creating chatbots, improving summarization/labeling, using interactive GenAI capabilities). The emphasis on both software engineering practices and specific GenAI applications, including chatbots and monitoring of GenAI solutions, aligns best with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement clearly outlines responsibilities that span both core software engineering/data engineering tasks and specific generative AI applications like chatbots and model monitoring. The technologies mentioned (Python, AWS, Azure OpenAI) and the objectives (chatbot, interactive GenAI) provide strong evidence for the role's focus. The profile assignment is unambiguous based on the provided definitions.
